price: We said, “Go, both of you, to the people who have rejected Our signs[17].” Then We destroyed them utterly.
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا
footnotes: [17] i.e., the divine teachings reached them through Prophet Jacob and Joseph, and the righteous people of Israel.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā idh'habā ilā al-qawmi alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā fadammarnāhum tadmīran
